## Description {#details}

The options string of a boolean type has the grammar:

bool&#95;options :: &quot;&quot; | &quot;Y&quot; | &quot;y&quot; | &quot;D&quot; | &quot;d&quot; | &quot;T&quot; | &quot;t&quot;

<hr/>
 

<Link id="details" />



| Y | YES / NO | | y | yes / no | | D / d | Integer 0 or 1 | | T | TRUE / FALSE | | t | true / false | 



<Link id="details" />
